text: @brooklynmutt And if your conscience doesn’t allow you to do either for fear of getting Covid-19 @KellyannePolls? Are you saying you believe in forcing people to endure unhealthy conditions against their will in order to exercise the lawful right to vote? What country do you think you live in?
